version_description:

2.Role gear extends to Lv.13, hero gear extends to lv. 11;

4.New Wing: wings of rebirth; New hairstyle: Rabbit Head wear."

German, French and Vietnamese localization added.
German, French and Vietnamese localization added.

New Function:
1.New Hero Awaken Function
2.Each wild area add layer 2 and 3. Each layer will have 2 new bosses.
3.Add Variant Monsters
4.Touch the screen can also move your team to other side.
5.Hero Dissolve can choose rank.

Adjustment:
1.Cancel 0 drop when higher level players in lower wild area. No PK remains the same
2.AUTO unlock at level 1
3.Decrease unique heart cost for S Hero rank up (rank+11 and above)
4.Multi Challenge (except abyss boss) add new mode.
5.Multi Challenge remove reward+50 period time. Add +100% for all Saturday and Sunday
6.New guild's trail time will be randomly chosen from the selecting time. (if leader doesn't choose)
7.Optimize wild quest trace screen
8.Add dissolve function for exp gear

Version 1.8.0 Update:
What’s new:
Added Spanish language
Added new customer service system
Extend max level to: Character up to Lv.300; Heroes, Relics, Skills, Talisman, Element Soul up to Lv.600
Optimized:
Multiple Players Instance - Hero Gate automatic enrollment function
Game UI optimization
Monthly card increase privilege: part of Single Player Daily Instance bonus +50%
Supreme card adds privileges: part of Multiple Players Daily Instance bonus +50%
The bonus of the monthly card and the monthly card Ⅱ is superimposed with the bonus of other functions.
Added one-click consume EXP book function for hero

Thank you for your companionship, and hope to be with you in the future
